title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: I recently made a post on a topic about safe casino on gambling discussion board. The topic recently moved to archival and I want to delete the post I made in there so that it will not be reflected on my post history.I notice that you can still reply on the topic but delete button is not available on my post. I just self report it to moderator for now but I’m not sure if my report will be handled since the topic is already on the Archival.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Clean the OP. Simple.I don't think it's something theymos would be interested to add though it would be good to have the feature.What's wrong if it remains in the post history? Any special reason that you are finding weird?

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Only forum staffs, admins can delete topics and there are years to store deleted topics in forum database, online, Archival and offline.Allowing users to self delete topics can increase scam and I believe don't allow it is better. Scammers will still scam but their scams will be shown for everyone.
